Experience the Authentic Flavors of Kenya

Indulge in the rich culinary heritage of Kenya at Kibandaski

Explore Our Menu

About Us

Kibandaski brings the essence of Kenyan street food to your table. With a focus on authenticity and quality, we strive to capture the true flavors of Kenya in every dish we serve.

From aromatic pilau to sizzling nyama choma, each bite will transport you to the bustling streets of Nairobi. Our chefs meticulously craft each dish using traditional recipes and fresh, locally-sourced ingredients.

Whether you're a Kenyan native or a curious traveler, join us on a culinary journey through the vibrant flavors of Kenya.

Our Menu

Pilau

Fragrant rice dish cooked with spices, meat, and vegetables.

Nyama Choma

Grilled meat served with kachumbari and ugali.

Samosa

Crispy pastry filled with spiced meat or vegetables.
